first_para: Gordon Birtwistle (born 6 September 1943) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for the constituency of Burnley, England, from May 2010. He was Parliamentary Private Secretary to Danny Alexander, Chief Secretary to the Treasury from 2010 to 2012. Since 2013 he has been Government Apprenticeship Ambassador to Business.

full.extract:
Gordon Birtwistle (born 6 September 1943) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for the constituency of Burnley, England, from May 2010. He was Parliamentary Private Secretary to Danny Alexander, Chief Secretary to the Treasury from 2010 to 2012. Since 2013 he has been Government Apprenticeship Ambassador to Business.
^ a b "Gordon Birtwistle MP". BBC Democracy Live (BBC). Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^
full.title: Gordon Birtwistle
